scripts.build: npm run build:unpkg & npm run build:es & npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format umd --file dist/navbar.umd.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format es --file dist/navbar.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format iife --file dist/navbar.min.js
scripts.patch: npm run build && npm version patch -m "New patch version for navbar" && git push --tags && npm run publish
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm version minor -m "New minor version for navbar" && git push --tags && npm run publish
scripts.major: npm run build && npm version major -m "New release version for navbar" && git push --tags && npm run publish
